outdated_data.title: Outdated data
outdated_data.description:
Current data is older than that recorded on the server, most likely because you have launched Twitchat multiple times, which is highly discouraged.

Close this page or replace server's data with current ones.
outdated_data.confirm:
Are you sure?
Any changes made in another instance of Twitchat will be overwritten by the settings of this instance.
